attributes.action: Introduce legislation to reduce the number of Members of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country has too many Members of Parliament.  With power normally divested to Ministers there is no need for 650+ Members of the House of Commons.  A significant reduction in numbers will instill confidence in the public and lead to savings in the cost of Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
